channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Versions of ‘Golden’ Will Continue Until Morale Improves
item.description: 'KPop Demon Hunters' will make fans wait for merch and a sequel, but its breakout bop now has even more alternate versions available.

item.title: J’ai vu les futurs TV NXTVision Art Life de TCL, des téléviseurs qui se font passer pour des tableaux
item.description: Présenté comme un téléviseur artistique haut de gamme, le TCL A400 Pro associe design type tableau et technologie QD‑Mini LED. Annoncé d’abord en Chine, il occupe une place de choix sur le stand TCL au CES 2026 de Las Vegas avant d’arriver en France.

item.title: Peach Bowl 2026 Free Streams: Watch Oregon vs Indiana, TV Channels, Preview
item.description: As the Oregon Ducks and Indiana Hoosiers go head-to-head in Atlanta, Georgia, here's how to watch Peach Bowl 2026 for free and from anywhere in the world.

item.title: World’s Richest Man Says Don’t Bother Saving for Retirement
item.description: "We're in the singularity. We're at the top of the roller coaster, and it's about to go down."

item.title: I tried a shockingly affordable 9.2.6-channel Dolby Atmos surround soundbar — and it's instantly addictive
item.description: This elite soundbar offers real side surrounds and huge bass for smaller spaces, and with an astounding early bird price

item.title: The Morning After: The best of CES 2026
item.description: We’re wrapping up coverage of the biggest tech show in the world. CES 2026 is almost over, and while we have more stories and wrap-ups to come, here are the most interesting products we’ve spotted, written about and critiqued/praised. That includes our picks for the best of CES. We gave out 15 awards as well as our best of show, and you might be surprised by some of our picks — I know I was. Read on for some of the best things to come out of Las Vegas this week, but first up, our Best of the Best winner, which was Lego Smart Play. As Engadget’s editor-in-chief Aaron Souppouris put it, “Lego co...

item.title: ICE Agent’s Cellphone Video of Renee Good’s Killing Leaks to Right-Wing Outlet
item.description: Shots were fired just 40 seconds after the ICE agent left his vehicle.

item.title: Ikea Smartened Up Some of Its Artsy-Fartsy Lights
item.description: The Swedish meatball restaurant now sells RGB donut-shaped lamps and bendy dimmable pendant lamps with smart home functionality.

item.title: How the Sleepbuds maker, Ozlo, is building a platform for sleep data
item.description: Ozlo Sleepbuds are going to have a big year, with new products, AI features, and more.

item.title: 'It's just a matter of time': Asus suggests integrated GPUs could be the future for gaming laptops sooner than you think
item.description: Ready for integrated graphics to take over from discrete GPUs? Asus believes 'it's just a matter of time' now.

item.title: ‘Primal’ Is Back From the Dead and as Gnarly as Ever
item.description: The third season of Genndy Tartakovsky's Adult Swim animated series sees its titular caveman fighting one prehistoric battle after another—this time, as a zombie.

item.title: The latest on Grok’s gross AI deepfakes problem
item.description: The launch of an AI image editing feature on xAI’s Grok has caused chaos on X after it was used to generate a flood of nonconsensual sexualized deepfakes. As Hayden Field wrote, “screenshots show Grok complying with requests to put real women in lingerie and make them spread their legs, and to put small children […]

item.title: WikiFlix Helps You Catch Up on Films That Just Entered the Public Domain
item.description: New films hit the public domain at the start of every year. WikiFlix is helping collect them.

item.title: 10 emergency directives retired as CISA declares them redundant
item.description: The directives served their purpose and are no longer needed.

item.title: WhatsApp might soon be subject to stricter scrutiny under the EU's Digital Services Act
item.description: Meta's messaging app WhatsApp could soon be subject to deeper scrutiny (and punishment) under the European Commission's Digital Services Act, Reuters reports. Because the app's broadcasting feature WhatsApp Channels grew to around 51.7 million average monthly active users in the European Union in the first six months of 2025, the feature has crossed the 45-million-person barrier that lets DSA rules apply.A platform is designated as a "very large online platform" or VLOP once it has 45 million monthly users or more, according to the European Commission. Once an app or service passes that amount...

item.title: 20 000 € moins cher qu’une Audi : Zeekr arrive enfin en France avec le break électrique 7GT qui fait mieux que Tesla
item.description: La marque chinoise de voitures électriques Zeekr arrive enfin en France, avec notamment ce nouveau modèle, le 7GT. Au programme : une recharge ultra-rapide, et des technologies qui font clairement penser à une Tesla. Pour un prix défiant toute concurrence.

item.title: Meta expands nuclear power ambitions to include Bill Gates’ startup
item.description: Meta has forged agreements with three nuclear power providers in an effort to secure the vast amount of electricity it needs to power AI data centers. The agreements with TerraPower (which is backed by Bill Gates), Oklo (backed by Sam Altman), and Vistra are expected to deliver 6.6 gigawatts of energy for Meta's projects by […]

item.title: Stock market ticks up toward records after mixed job market data
item.description: The gains came after the U.S. Labor Department said employers hired fewer workers in total during December than economists expected. U.S. stocks are rising toward records Friday following a mixed report on the U.S. job market, one that may delay another cut to interest rates by the Federal Reserve but does not slam the door on it.

item.title: A Thousand Blows season 2 review: the Disney+ bareknuckle boxing series is more brutal than ever
item.description: A Thousand Blows season 2 returns to Disney+ and Hulu, and this time, it's an even tougher fight for survival.

item.title: How to watch Cameroon vs. Morocco online for free
item.description: How to watch AFCON for free. Live stream Cameroon vs. Morocco in the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations for free.

item.title: Takedowns and arrests didn't slow down ransomware in 2025
item.description: Despite the police's best efforts, ransomware continues to rise with more actors, more victims, and more trouble.
